channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street sweeping missed!, 30th July
item.description:
Findon Road has not been swept for 2 weeks please can we get someone to clean the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Findon Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More flytipping on edge of Frobisher Estate, 30th July
item.description:

item.title: Smoking, 30th July
item.description:
Why is the clearer smoking at the bus stop Under the sign that clearly reads no smoking. When he arrives every morning we all start choking and coughing. Second hand smoke is a killer.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 414, Edgware Road, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The entire area is full of litter and graffiti and is an awful eye sore., 30th July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidbrooke Park Road, Kidbrooke, London
